title: Gold
cleaned_text:
Looking for facts to reference when you talk to family and friends about vaccine safety?



Here’s Dr. Alan Palmer’s FREE 718-page interactive eBook, now containing excerpts from well over 1,400 published PubMed studies! These studies contain thousands of additional supportive references… the science is all here in this important reference guide. 



These scientific studies clearly contradict what we are being told by many medical doctors, the media, our government officials, and the pharmaceutical industry about the safety and effectiveness of vaccines. We are told, time and time again, that vaccines are extremely safe and effective and that “the science is settled” on the matter.



‍THE SCIENCE IS FAR FROM SETTLED!

‍

Dr. Palmer spent 2 years researching and writing the most comprehensive scientific expose of vaccines to date. This PDF download book contains over 1,400 studies, written by thousands of scientists and researchers that contradict what we are being told by the vaccine industry... and the media that they control. Published in an interactive PDF format, it allows for keyword and phrase searching, links accessing the subject pages in the document from the table of contents, and links in each subject topic to the original abstract or study online. This is your simple, “go-to” resource for easily accessing this vital information.
